content.prompt: Which of the following aspects of the design for this new urban development will best help to reduce the amount of carbon dioxide released into the atmosphere?

choices.label: The land cleared to build the new development occurs in a rural area rather than within the city limits.
The playground is made with permeable foam pavers rather than with impervious concrete.
Access to the mass transit train line will provide inhabitants an alternative to driving personal vehicles.
Food and other resources must be transported to the development from up to 200 miles away.

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Describe disadvantages, advantages, or unintended consequences for potential solutions.
